message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of phase retrieval from magnitude-only information, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The proposed approach involves nonconvex optimization and stochastic gradient descent, which are common techniques in machine learning (cs.LG). The experiments involve reconstructing images, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also mentions the use of large-scale implementations, which suggests numerical analysis (cs.NA) as a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the robustness of the approach, which could be relevant to statistics (cs.SI).
